content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Must visit and definitely a frequent visit. Recommend coming earlier if the group is larger, but one of the best and affordable kbbq in LA.The pork meats are definitely the highlight, but the Bul-nificent is also incredible and highly recommend. I would order pork first, order Bul-nificent and then cook the fried rice in the left over sauce.Also, the owner is super friendly and the service is top tier.
